data.name: SRPG Studio Snow Background
data.detailed_description:
This is the battle background formatted for the SRPG Studio with a size of 840 x 480.
The following files are contained.

1. snow_bridge
2. snow_castle
3. snow_field
4. snow_forest
5. snow_load
6. snow_mountain
7. snow_sea
8. snow_temple
9. snow_throne
10. snow_village

The terms of use of materials are as below:

1. Materials can be used, not only for the game created with the SRPG Studio.
2. Materials can be used and processed.
3. The author's copyright of the materials belongs to SapphireSoft. However, when you use the materials, you are not required to mention it.
4. The sales of the materials are prohibited. The sales of the processed materials are also prohibited.

data.short_description: Background images to consider the battle in the snow map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
